decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been provided with the current submission to judge the appropriateness of the a/c condenser units.  Whilst noise data is provided regarding the units, insufficient information has been provided to demonstrate that they will not cause a loss of amenity to the neighbouring residential premises due to noise and vibration and the proposal is therefore contrary to Havering Local Plan 2016-2031 Policies 7, 26 and 34.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: Consideration was given to seeking amendments, but given conflict with adopted planning policy, it was necessary to issue a decision as close to the statutory timeframe as possible as opposed to seeking amendments which would have significantly delayed the application.
description: Retention and alteration of existing Air-Conditioning units, with acoustic screening.
